title: Which US state was the first to secede from the Union, in 1860, leading to the American Civil War? - Quora
tags: Military History of the United States of America
History of the United States of America
Politics of the United States of America

response.answer_text: South Carolina, which had always been the most radical “fire-eating” Southern state. When Sherman’s Union troops marched through the South in 1865, they were particularly hard on S.C.because of its role in “starting the war”.
As the song says “gallant South Carolina was first to make a stand” on 20th December 1860. In 1865 Sherman’s troops were all to happy to deal with such gallantry with a zeal.
